1575616132_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: its been found out that 08chan is flawed in that you can't actually blacklist correctly. Efforts are ongoing to shill zero's millchan to gain users so it can realize its goal. The Phillipino police are after the cripple and Jim both and 8chan after its resurgence of 8kun is a disappointment.

> [nickwa](#comment_444_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): A lot of people loved 8kun from what I read on the site though, so that's odd.

A lot of people loved 8chan when free speech was still a prerogative. It was the best site on the internet for years in my opinion. After its reboot, it was cucked from day one of the kun. I will always remember 8chan fondly and have an image museum of its many great threads, happenings, and fantastic OC. 8chan was like 2006-2010 4chan, while it lasted. Much fun was to be had.
I have a lot of faith in Millchan now and think that if there is a one-click-blacklist-all-cp button, it can be the platform that pushes ZeroNet to the next level.
